welcome: Welcome to Woori, a restaurant where Italian flavors meet Korean tradition. The name "Woori" means "we" in Korean, and here, everyone is part of our community. Enjoy our Korean dishes alongside pizza and pasta.
menu.korean.beef-bibimbap.name: Beef bibimbap
